overview: In early 90s, a group of young woman worked hardly with in factory for their future dreams. However, the international enterprise closed down the factory without a word. Suddenly workers became activists. They struggled all the way from the remote factory in South Korea to their employer's headquarters in Japan. Their action not only hit the company, but also rocked the workers union movement in japan.
title: Swany-Recording of Protest Trip of Asia Swany in 1989
